sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.NotifyInterfaceException</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>NotifyInterfaceException</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NotifyInterfaceException = Class.create();
NotifyInterfaceException.prototype = {
    initialize: function(msg) {
		if (msg instanceof Array) {
			this.errors = msg;
			this.message = msg.join('\n');
		} else {
			this.message = msg + '';
			this.errors = [this.message];
		}
    },

    type: 'NotifyInterfaceException'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-04-09 08:23:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0654520c53b03300b18addeeff7b12d1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NotifyInterfaceException</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notify" source="com.snc.notify">b567f9452f140110d8a4d5f62799b6e4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0654520c53b03300b18addeeff7b12d1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-09 12:45:48</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>327</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
